About the course

Million Dollar Instructor is a series of video lessons and tutorials that will take you behind the scenes and teach you every trick in the trade that John and Eliot (founders of Bitfountain.io) have used to create incredibly engaging and positively reviewed online courses that have been taken by over 100,000 students.

They also share the marketing and promotion strategies they used to scale their business up to the tune of over $1m net to them in 2014. The course is rounded off with interviews from the best teacher entrepreneurs there are - along with a goodie bag with all the free software you need to start your own online teaching business.

A Letter from Ankur

Online Courses are the Future of Media

Everything we knew about education has changed.

Never before in history has it been feasible for one individual to teach millions of people at scale.

Historically, people have always learned from local experts - your high school football coach, your community college professor, the pastor at your local church, the intensive coding bootcamp at the nearest city.

Chances are none of those teachers were truly exceptional. At least not compared to all the potential teachers for that specific topic in the entire world

Have you heard the proverb: "Those who can, do; those who can't, teach"?

But now with a high speed Internet connection... the script has flipped. Why should you learn from anyone but the best anymore?

Why should you enroll in a social media course at a local community college when you can have Gary Vaynerchuk teaching you instead?

You should be learning writing from a New York Times best-selling author, screenwriting from an Oscar-winning artist or learning to hustle straight from Jay-Z.

And excitingly this phenomenon is well under way.

With the opportunity to teach tens of thousands of students without having to go through a university as an intermediary, there is no longer a ceiling on how much money a teacher can make.

In fact, the Wall Street Journal reports of teachers in Korea making $4m a year teaching hundreds of thousands of students.

And this is just the beginning.

This is why I founded Fedora a little over a year ago.

We want to power technology for "super teachers" - an instructor teaching thousands of students at scale, making seven figures a year.

And now finally one year in... we have unlocked our first million dollar instructors - two individuals that are on track to make over $1m in online course sales.

This is their story.

Frequently Asked Questions

What plan do you recommend?
We recommend you start with the Free plan and try the service before deciding to upgrade to any of the more powerful plans.
Does Fedora charge a setup fee?
There are absolutely no set up fees of any kind - you can launch your school entirely for free.
Who pays for hosting and video bandwidth?
All content hosting (including video) is completely included in the Fedora monthly and transaction fees. And yes, there is no limit to your bandwidth usage.
Am I allowed to offer free courses with Fedora?
Absolutely - you can offer free courses and there are no transaction fees with free courses at all. If you don't make money, we don't make money.
How do transaction fees work?
Every time a user purchases anything on your school, we collect the Transaction Fee according to your plan - the greater your monthly plan, the lower your transaction fee. You'll never have to pay more than the sale price of the course though - so if you are on the Free plan and sell a course for a $1, we'll only take $1 and not $1.10.
